section.title: Description
section.p: "Indicates the category of caregiver with responsibility for managing this specific problem (e.g., care team, nursing, medicine, respiratory therapy, occupational therapy, dietary, etc.)." - HL7 Version 2.8, PRB-11

stentry.p: "Indicates the category of caregiver with responsibility for managing this specific problem (e.g., care team, nursing, medicine, respiratory therapy, occupational therapy, dietary, etc.)." - HL7 Version 2.8, PRB-11. Note that HL7does not provide any suggested values for this code.
